title: Clarify Python autosubmission prerequisites
author: ljones140
details: Added a note specifying that Python autosubmission requires a `.python-version` file to define the Python version, as it uses `actions/setup-python` for installation.
Clarified prerequisites for Python dependency autosubmission to prevent action failures.
summary:
- Added a note specifying that Python autosubmission requires a `.python-version` file to define the Python version, as it uses `actions/setup-python` for installation.
- Clarified prerequisites for Python dependency autosubmission to prevent action failures.
generated_title: Clarify Python version requirement for dependency autosubmission

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added a note specifying that Python autosubmission requires a `.python-version` file to define the Python version, as it uses `actions/setup-python` for installation.
- Clarified prerequisites for Python dependency autosubmission to prevent action failures.

### Title  
Clarify Python version requirement for dependency autosubmission
